title: 물가 상승/투자 수익률
content:
Robert Merton of Harvard has pointed out that a dollar invested in 1926 in US Treasury bills would have become 14 dollars by 1996. The same dollar invested in the S&P index would have grown to 1,370 dollars. However if perfect timing each month had been possible and the money switched between these two investment routes the total by 1996 would have become 2,296,183,456 dollars! 

1926 ~ 1996 1달러 
국채 투자시 16배
주가지수 투자시 1380배
둘 간의 최적 시점으로 투자시 230만배
